# predict.makeup — Makeup & Beauty Prediction Markets

> Real-time prediction markets for makeup & beauty. Bet on outcomes, see live odds, and win. Free to play with shared pools powered by Firebase.


predict.makeup is a prediction market platform focused on makeup & beauty. Users can bet YES or NO on curated markets with real-time shared pools. Features live odds, countdown timers, trending markets, and social sharing. Part of the Predict Network — 18 niche prediction market sites.


## Pages

- [Homepage — Makeup & Beauty prediction markets with live odds](https://predict.makeup)
- [Markets — Active makeup & beauty prediction markets](https://predict.makeup#markets)


## Keywords

prediction market, makeup & beauty, betting, odds, forecast, predict.makeup
